original_text: Saul also talked with the Jews who spoke the Greek language. He argued with them about Jesus. As a result, they wanted to kill him.
korean_text: 또 주 예수의 이름으로 담대히 말하고 헬라파 유대인들과 함께 말하며 변론하니 그 사람들이 죽이려고 힘쓰거늘

sentences.original_text: Saul also talked with the Jews
He argued with them about Jesus
As a result, they wanted to kill him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 그들은 그를 죽이려고 했습니다
